description:
Elcomsoft Updater is a supplemental application to other Elcomsoft products.

Elcomsoft Updater is a supplemental application to other Elcomsoft products.
Elcomsoft Updater automatically checks for new versions of Elcomsoft software installed on the computer, keeping the software versions up-to-date to help users receive timely updates with new features, software optimizations and security fixes.
Elcomsoft Updater is an optional part of the overall software package when you install Elcomsoft products.
We strongly recommend keeping the Updater option selected during the installation to keep up with Elcomsoft new releases.
